ROW.NAME: 长亏不倒企业+发票领用+申报

ROW.DATDSC:
--风险特征：长亏不倒企业 + 发票领用 + 销售收入 + 应纳税额 select rownum,t.*, (select nsrztmc from DM_GY_NSRZT zt where t1.nsrzt_dm=zt.nsrzt_dm) nsrzt, (select swryxm from DM_GY_SWRY swry where swry.swry_dm=t1.SSGLY_DM)ssgly, (select name from v_swjg sw where sw.id=substr(t1.zgswskfj_dm,1,7))zgswjg, (select swjgmc from DM_GY_SWJG jg where t1.zgswskfj_dm=jg.swjg_dm)zgswskfj, (select hymc from DM_GY_HY hy where t1.hy_dm=hy.hy_dm and hy.yxbz='Y')hy from ( select nsrsbh,nsrmc, sum(lrze_dn)lrze_dn,sum(lrze_qyn_1)lrze_qyn_1 ,sum(lrze_qyn_2)lrze_qyn_2,sum(lrze_qyn_3)lrze_qyn_3,--sum(qyn_4)qyn_4,sum(qyn_5)qyn_5, sum(sbje_dn)sbje_dn,sum(sbje_qyn_1)sbje_qyn_1,sum(sbje_qyn_2)sbje_qyn_2,sum(sbje_qyn_3)sbje_qyn_3, sum(ynse_dn)ynse_dn,sum(ynse_qyn_1)ynse_qyn_1,sum(ynse_qyn_2)ynse_qyn_2,sum(ynse_qyn_3)ynse_qyn_3, sum(fpsl_dn)fpsl_dn,sum(fpsl_qyn_1)fpsl_qyn_1,sum(fpsl_qyn_2)fpsl_qyn_2,sum(fpsl_qyn_3)fpsl_qyn_3 from ( select to_char(qysds.djxh)djxh, dj.nsrsbh, dj.nsrmc, dj.shxydm, lrze_dn,lrze_qyn_1,lrze_qyn_2,lrze_qyn_3,lrze_qyn_4,lrze_qyn_5, sb.sbje_dn, sb.ynse_dn, sb.sbje_qyn_1, sb.ynse_qyn_1, sb.sbje_qyn_2, sb.ynse_qyn_2, sb.sbje_qyn_3, sb.ynse_qyn_3, fp.fpsl_dn, fp.fpsl_qyn_1, fp.fpsl_qyn_2, fp.fpsl_qyn_3 from ( select djxh, sum(case when tjnf=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') then lrze else 0 end) lrze_dn, sum(case when tjnf=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-1 then lrze else 0 end) lrze_qyn_1, sum(case when tjnf=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-2 then lrze else 0 end) lrze_qyn_2, sum(case when tjnf=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-3 then lrze else 0 end) lrze_qyn_3, sum(case when tjnf=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-4 then lrze else 0 end) lrze_qyn_4, sum(case when tjnf=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-5 then lrze else 0 end) lrze_qyn_5 from( SELECT djxh,tjnf, sum(yysr) yysr, sum(YYCB) yycb, sum(XSFY) xsfy, sum(GLFY) glfy, sum(cwfy) cwfy, sum(yylr) yylr, sum(yywsr) yywsr, sum(yywzc) yywzc, sum(lrze) lrze, sum(NSTZZJE) NSTZZJE, sum(NSTZJSE) NSTZJSE, sum(YNSSDE) YNSSDE, sum(YNSE) YNSE FROM ( select sbuuid,djxh, -- (select nvl(dj.shxydm, dj.NSRSBH)from dj_nsrxx dj where SBXX.DJXH = DJ.DJXH AND rownum = 1) nsrsbh, -- (select dj.NSRMC from dj_nsrxx dj where SBXX.DJXH = DJ.DJXH AND rownum = 1) NSRMC, skssqq,skssqz, gzlx_dm_1, zfbz_1, sjgsdq, zgswskfj_dm, (case when zgswskfj_dm like '14511%' then zgswskfj_dm else sjgsdq end )zgswjg, to_char(skssqq,'yyyy') tjnf from sb_sbxx sbxx where (zgswskfj_dm like '14511%' or sjgsdq like '14511%') and gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','5') and zfbz_1 !='Y' )T1, ( select sbuuid,yysr,YYCB,YYSJ_FJ,XSFY,GLFY, CWFY,ZCJZSS,GYJZBDSY,TZSY,YYLR,YYWSR,YYWZC, LRZE,NSTZJSE,NSTZZJE,YNSSDE,SL_1,YNSE,LRRQ ,'14年版' from SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_QYSDSNDNSSBZB
union all select sbuuid,yysr,YYCB,YYSJ_FJ,XSFY,GLFY, CWFY,ZCJZSS,GYJZBDSY,TZSY,YYLR,YYWSR,YYWZC, LRZE,NSTZJSE,NSTZZJE,YNSSDE,SL_1,YNSE,LRRQ ,'14年前版' from SB_SDS_JMCZ_ND ) T2 WHERE T1.SBUUID=T2.Sbuuid group by djxh,tjnf )group by djxh ) qysds,
(select distinct djxh,nvl(shxydm,nsrsbh) nsrsbh,shxydm,nsrmc,zgswskfj_dm,nsrzt_dm from dj_nsrxx)dj, ( select djxh,sum(jsyj) sbje,sum(ynse) ynse, sum(case when to_char(skssqq,'yyyy')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') then jsyj else 0 end) sbje_DN, sum(case when to_char(skssqq,'yyyy')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') then ynse else 0 end) ynse_DN, sum(case when to_char(skssqq,'yyyy')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-1 then jsyj else 0 end) sbje_QYN_1, sum(case when to_char(skssqq,'yyyy')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-1 then ynse else 0 end) ynse_QYN_1, sum(case when to_char(skssqq,'yyyy')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-2 then jsyj else 0 end) sbje_QYN_2, sum(case when to_char(skssqq,'yyyy')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-2 then ynse else 0 end) ynse_QYN_2, sum(case when to_char(skssqq,'yyyy')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-3 then jsyj else 0 end) sbje_QYN_3, sum(case when to_char(skssqq,'yyyy')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-3 then ynse else 0 end) ynse_QYN_3 FROM( SELECT a.djxh, a.jsyj, a.ynse, a.skssqq from sb_sbxx a where a.ZSXM_DM='10101' and a.skssqq>=to_date('[%DAT1]','yyyy-mm-dd') and a.skssqz<=to_date('[%DAT2]','yyyy-mm-dd') and a.zgswskfj_dm like '14511%' and a.zfbz_1='N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','5')) group by djxh ) sb, ( select djxh,sum(fpsl) fpsl, sum(case when to_char(lrrq,'yyyy')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') then FPSL else 0 end) fpsl_DN, sum(case when to_char(lrrq,'yyyy')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-1 then FPSL else 0 end) fpsl_QYN_1, sum(case when to_char(lrrq,'yyyy')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-2 then FPSL else 0 end) fpsl_QYN_2, sum(case when to_char(lrrq,'yyyy')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-3 then FPSL else 0 end) fpsl_QYN_3 from ( select b.djxh, a.FPSL,a.lrrq from FP_LY_MX a,FP_LY b where trim(a.fplyuuid)=trim(b.fplyuuid) and a.lrrq>=to_date('[%DAT1]','yyyy-mm-dd')) group by djxh
) fp where qysds.djxh=dj.djxh(+) and qysds.djxh=sb.djxh(+) and qysds.djxh=fp.djxh(+) and dj.nsrzt_dm in '03' and (lrze_qyn_1<0 and lrze_qyn_2<0 and lrze_qyn_3<0 ) and substr(dj.zgswskfj_dm,1,7) in (select id from v_swjg start with id='[%ZGSWJG]' connect by prior id=sjid) order by djxh )group by nsrsbh,nsrmc) t,( SELECT distinct nsrsbh,nsrzt_dm,zgswskfj_dm,SSGLY_DM,hy_dm FROM( SELECT NSRSBH,NSRMC,DJRQ,NSRZT_DM,zgswskfj_dm,SSGLY_DM,hy_dm, ROW_NUMBER()OVER (PARTITION BY NSRSBH ORDER BY DJRQ DESC ) RN FROM ( select to_char(djxh),nvl(shxydm,nsrsbh)nsrsbh,shxydm,NSRMC,djrq,jdxz_dm,YXBZ,NSRZT_DM,zgswskfj_dm,SSGLY_DM,hy_dm from dj_nsrxx where zgswskfj_dm like '14511%' and yxbz='Y' ORDER BY DJXH,NSRSBH,DJRQ) )WHERE RN=1 ) t1 where t.nsrsbh=t1.nsrsbh(+)
